review: This device is AWESOME!!!  I used to have computers hooked up to every TV in my house in order to watch movies.  Then I would try and keep all my movies in sync between my computers.  This device solves that issue.  When you pair it with PLEX media server, it REALLY shines.  I have a Plex client on my Android phone and my PLEX media server on my main computer.  I can direct my media to play on ANY of my TV's over Chromecast right from my Android phone.  I can then stop, pause, fast forward, or rewind  right from my phone.  The media doesn't stream through my phone, rather my phone is just controlling the Chromecast streaming from my Plex Media server.
